abstract: Letter from Sens Susan Collins and Heidi Heitkamp responds to July 1 Jeffrey Kahn Op-Ed arguing against 'no buy' list for firearms.
lead_paragraph: Senators Susan Collins and Heidi Heitkamp discuss their bipartisan legislation.

headline.main: On the No-Fly List? No Gun
headline.print_headline: On the No-Fly List? No Gun

snippet: Senators Susan Collins and Heidi Heitkamp discuss their bipartisan legislation....
